Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.

Combine softened butter with sugar in a bowl, and beat until creamy. Add eggs one at a time, incorporating well after each addition. Dissolve baking soda in hot water, then add to the egg mixture. Stir in flour and cinnamon until fully incorporated. Finally, mix in the dates and walnuts evenly.
Spoon heaping spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets and bake for 10 to 15 minutes, or until golden, in the preheated oven.
